suppress.notes: Suppressing false positive - the testContainers mysql plugin is a different thing to the actual mysql database. https://github.com/jeremylong/DependencyCheck/issues/4900
Suppressing false positive - the testContainers mariadb plugin is a different thing to the actual mariadb database. https://github.com/jeremylong/DependencyCheck/issues/4898
Suppressing false positive - the mariadb r2dbc client is a different thing to the actual mariadb database. https://github.com/jeremylong/DependencyCheck/issues/4899
Suppressing false positive - mockito-junit-jupiter is a different thing to JUnit itself. https://github.com/jeremylong/DependencyCheck/issues/4754
Suppressing false positive - r2dbc-postgresql is versioned separately from postgresql itself. https://github.com/jeremylong/DependencyCheck/issues/4616
